select BO_AWS_COMMISION_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into BO_AWS_COMMISION (ID,ORGNO, BINDID, CREATEDATE, CREATEUSER, UPDATEDATE, UPDATEUSER, WORKFLOWID, WORKFLOWSTEPID, ISEND, UID1, UIDNAME1, COMPANYNAME1, DPTPATH1, DATEFROM, DATETO, MEMO, STATUS, COMMISIONTYPE, RECIPIENT) values (#{id}, #{orgno}, #{bindid}, #{createdate}, #{createuser}, sysdate, #{updateuser}, #{workflowid}, #{workflowstepid}, #{isend}, #{uid1}, #{uidname1}, #{companyname1}, #{dptpath1}, #{datefrom}, #{dateto}, #{memo}, #{status}, #{commisiontype}, #{recipient})
